articles.description: There are 83 new COVID-19 cases in Northeast Tennessee, according to numbers released Saturday by the Tennessee Department of Health. Here are the total cases by county as well as the change in cases:Hancock: 11Hawkins: 86, +3Sullivan: 210, +21Johnson: 46, +1…

articles.author: Stassy Olmos and Nexstar Media Wire
articles.title: Doctors note new COVID-19 symptoms in young adults - 8News
articles.description: As the numbers show, the increase in COVID-19 cases is predominantly from people in their 20s and 30s, and with that, doctors are finding a new set of symptoms.
articles.content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (WKRN) Statistics in multiple states show an increase in COVID-19 cases predominantly from people in their 20s and 30s, and now doctors say they are also seeing different symptoms am… [+1864 chars]
